== Who is Lucas Messenger? ==
    Lucas Messenger(Lmessenger) is a 15 year old Ubuntu user. He is currently part of the PNW and Washington LoCo teams. He enjoys modifying themes for Ubuntu and will always try a new theme whenever possible.

=== I... ===

* am trying to get friends to understand how easy Linux is.

* believe in supporting open source applications.

* believe that Ubuntu should have a very appealing interface.

* have been an Ubuntu user since Dapper.

* have used Linux before when I was young at a friend's house (His dad would use it for his work), but I never actually got involved and started using Linux until I got a 6.06 CD.

* am working on learning Python (for the second time).

* prefer Ubuntu over Windows.
